All functions

clean_real()

Clean real datasets

compute_agg()

Compute aggregate measures

compute_agg_dp()

Compute aggregate measures using dplyr

compute_agg_dt()

Compute aggregate measures using data.table Tidy can manage data.tables so no need to convert back

compute_mean_median()

Helper function to compute_agg_dt

compute_one_iteration()

Computes one iteration of the simulation

compute_pp()

Compute preprocessing pipelines

compute_test()

Compute t-test

compute_test_dp()

Compute aggregate measures using dplyr

compute_test_dt()

Compute aggregate measures using data.table Tidy can manage data.tables so no need to convert back

format_flexicon()

Format flexicon data

format_stroop()

Format Stroop data

format_synth()

Format the simulated data csv's originally generated using python

gen_dummy()

Generate dummy datasets for testing

gen_dummy_agg()

Generate a dataset to be used as parameter in compute_agg

gen_dummy_sample()

Generate a dataset to be used as parameter in sample_data

gen_dummy_shuffle()

Generate a dataset to be used as parameter in shuffle_cond

gen_dummy_test()

Generate a dataset to be used as parameter in compute_test

get_dummy_df()

Create dummy data frame

get_ids()

Get unique ids of the dataset

get_ntc()

Get the number of trials per condition

get_test_data()

Load test data

run_simulation()

Get file and launch iterations

sample_data()

Sample data

shuffle_cond()

Adds shuffled condition

t_test()

t-test lite version
